name: Hyper Universe - Hyper All Stars Starter Pack
detailed_description:
You can bet the Hyper Team are gamers, too. With this pack you can collect all of the Hyper Universe Team’s favorite fighters in a single DLC, instantly unlocking Valter, Louis, Ignitia, and Turner, as well as granting you access to all of their unique equipment. Lock-in your choice with these All Stars and we’ll see you out there on the battlefield!

This pack contains the following:

Hypers and their unique equipment
  • Valter
  • Louis
  • Ignitia
  • Turner

To redeem this package in-game please do the following:
Instructions:
1. Purchase DLC
2. Launch client
3. Go to Hyper Shop
4. Click "Purchased Items"
5. Redeem Items

*Please note that any items already owned from this pack upon purchase will not be credited or refunded.

short_description: We love all of our children equally, but some more than others. Download a pack of our personal favorite Hypers, including Valter, Louis, Ignitia, and Turner, and receive all of these Hypers’ unique equipment sets as well.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese-Brazil
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 7 32-bit
  • Processor: Intel Dual Core or better
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9600 or better AMD Radeon HD 4830 or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 650 or better AMD Radeon HD 7750 or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
